children.value:
Switch statement is one of decision-making control-flow statements. It tests the value of an expression
against a list of integer or character constants. When a match is found the statements associated with that
constants are executed. The conditional operator is also known as a ternary operator. The conditional
statements are the decision-making statements which depends upon the output of the expression.
It is represented by two symbols, i.e., '?' and ':'. The switch and conditional operator exercise program
list has been given bellow. All the programs have been solved in three programming languages are C, C++ and
Java. Start your journey with C, C++ and Java programming with the switch and conditional operator program
list-
Switch and Conditional Operator Exercise Program List
Write a C program to find the maximum between two numbers using switch-case.
Write a C program to find the maximum between three numbers using switch-case.
Write a C program to print number between 1 to 10 in character format using switch-case.
Write a C program to accept id from user to confirm department using switch-case.
Write a C program to check password is correct or incorrect using switch-case.
Write a C program to print day of week using switch-case.
Write a C program to create calculator using switch-case.
Write a C program to check whether a year is a leap year or not using switch
Write a C program to check whether a character is an alphabet or not using the switch.
Write a C program to take the value from the user as input any alphabet and check whether it is vowel or consonant using the switch.
Write a C program to take the value from the user as input any character and check whether it is the alphabet, digit or special character using the switch.
Write a C program to check whether a character is an uppercase or lowercase alphabet. using the switch.
Write a C program to count the total number of notes in a given amount using the switch.
Write a C program to take the value from the user as input all sides of a triangle and check whether the triangle is valid or not using switch.
Write a C program to check whether the triangle is an equilateral, isosceles or scalene triangle using switch.
Write a C program to check whether a number is even or odd using switch case.
Write a C program to check whether a number is positive, negative or zero using switch
Write a C program to find all the roots of a quadratic equation using switch.
Write a C program to take the hours and minutes as input by the user and the show that whether it is AM or PM by using the switch.

Write a C program to convert a positive number into negative number and negative number into a positive number using switch.
Conditional Operator
Write a C program to find maximum between two numbers using conditional operator.
Write a C program to find maximum between three numbers using conditional operator.
Write a C program to check whether a number is even or odd using conditional operator.
Write a C program to check whether a number is positive or negative using conditional operator.
Write a C program to check whether year is leap year or not using conditional operator.
Write a C program to check whether character is an alphabet or not using conditional operator.
Write a program to take the value from the user as input all sides of a triangle and check whether the triangle is valid or not using conditional operator.
Write a program using conditional operators to determine whether a year entered through the keyboard is a leap year or not.
Write a C program whether the character entered through the keyboard is a lower case alphabet or not.
Write a C program whether a character entered through the keyboard is a special symbol or not.

{`Switch statement is one of decision-making control-flow statements. It tests the value of an expression against a list of integer or character constants. When a match is found the statements associated with that constants are executed. The conditional operator is also known as a ternary operator. The conditional statements are the decision-making statements which depends upon the output of the expression. It is represented by two symbols, i.e., ’?’ and ’:‘. The switch and conditional operator exercise program list has been given bellow. All the programs have been solved in three programming languages are C, C++ and Java. Start your journey with C, C++ and Java programming with the switch and conditional operator program list-`}

{`Switch and Conditional Operator Exercise Program List`}

  1. {`Write a C program to find the maximum between two numbers using switch-case.`}
  2. {`Write a C program to find the maximum between three numbers using switch-case.`}

  7. {`Write a C program to create calculator using switch-case.`}
  8. {`Write a C program to check whether a year is a leap year or not using switch`}
  9. {`Write a C program to check whether a character is an alphabet or not using the switch.`}

  11. {`Write a C program to take the value from the user as input any character and check whether it is the alphabet, digit or special character using the switch.`}
  12. {`Write a C program to check whether a character is an uppercase or lowercase alphabet. using the switch.`}
  13. {`Write a C program to count the total number of notes in a given amount using the switch.`}
  14. {`Write a C program to take the value from the user as input all sides of a triangle and check whether the triangle is valid or not using switch.`}
  15. {`Write a C program to check whether the triangle is an equilateral, isosceles or scalene triangle using switch.`}
  16. {`Write a C program to check whether a number is even or odd using switch case.`}
  17. {`Write a C program to check whether a number is positive, negative or zero using switch`}
  18. {`Write a C program to find all the roots of a quadratic equation using switch.`}
  19. {`Write a C program to take the hours and minutes as input by the user and the show that whether it is AM or PM by using the switch.`}
  20. {`Write a C program to convert a positive number into negative number and negative number into a positive number using switch. Conditional Operator`}
  21. {`Write a C program to find maximum between two numbers using conditional operator.`}
  22. {`Write a C program to find maximum between three numbers using conditional operator.`}
  23. {`Write a C program to check whether a number is even or odd using conditional operator.`}
  24. {`Write a C program to check whether a number is positive or negative using conditional operator.`}
  25. {`Write a C program to check whether year is leap year or not using conditional operator.`}
  26. {`Write a C program to check whether character is an alphabet or not using conditional operator.`}
  27. {`Write a program to take the value from the user as input all sides of a triangle and check whether the triangle is valid or not using conditional operator.`}
  28. {`Write a program using conditional operators to determine whether a year entered through the keyboard is a leap year or not.`}
  29. {`Write a C program whether the character entered through the keyboard is a lower case alphabet or not.`}
  30. {`Write a C program whether a character entered through the keyboard is a special symbol or not.`}
